doc:
John Gregson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Gregson 0 John Gregson, (born Harold Thomas Gregson, (15 March 1919 – 8 January 1975) was an English actor of stage, television and film, with 40 credited film roles. He was best known for his comedy roles. He was credited in 40 films between 1948 and 1971, and on television from 1960 until his death. He was often cast as a police inspector or as a navy or army officer, or for his comedy roles in Ealing and other British films. John_Gregson , ( born Harold_Thomas_Gregson , ( 15_March_1919 – 8_January_1975 ) was an_English_actor of stage_,_television_and_film , with 40_credited_film_roles . He was_best_known for his_comedy_roles . He was_credited in 40_films between 1948_and_1971 , and on television from 1960 until his_death . He was_often_cast as a_police_inspector or as a_navy_or_army_officer , or for his_comedy_roles in Ealing and other_British_films .
